name: Sisyphean Dreamer
description:
Push the boulder to the top of the mountain Controls

D (or right arrow): push boulder

R: restart level

ESC: pause

Credits

Ronnie Sallan: Game Design & Programming

Leo 'Awez' Chenevert: Art & Animation

Jake Archer: Sound Design & Music

Misc.

This game was made for the Weekly Game Jame (Week 153). The theme was 'Roll'.

The title of this game was inspired by the song 'Over and Over and Over' by Jack White.
